TopicTitle: Crash Two Kerbals Into Each Other

Articles.Content: The ideal location would be on or around the Mun or Minmus. The only rule is that they must start at least 1 km from each other

Edit: You hear poof and that is about it.... Broke me out in giggles a bit I thought the plane might go out of control, but nope!

As per another thread, if you jump a kerbal directly into the exhaust stream of an engine, they will not be burnt up and insteda be ejected very very fast.

Making a giant cannon with one of the giant stock engines mounted at ~45 degrees you can shoot a kerbal about 1900m high and 5km away with this method. They die on impact of course.

If you could get this setup to minimus you could probably orbit a kerbal with it.
